TEXT.S:
Larry Bird
nilacul Larry Bird nalecuhan ciniza i 12 a bulad 7 a demiad, 1956 a mihcaan. ci Larry Bird, u kawaw niza sa, u miunduay. u mimaliay ciniza i NBA nu Amilika. katukuh 2019 a mihcaan, enem a bataan izaw ku pitu ku mihcaan ciniza. u lumeniay a banges niza, u lumeniay a tademaw ciniza.
namakayzaay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinenganLists of National Basketball Association players
